metadata.inclusion:
1. Follow the instructions for your Z-Wave certified controller to add a device to the Z-Wave network.
2. Once the controller is ready to add your device, press and release the top or bottom rocker
metadata.exclusion:
1. Follow the instructions for your Z-Wave certified controller to remove a device from the Z-Wave network.
2. Once the controller is ready to remove your device, press and release the top or bottom rocker
metadata.reset: Quickly press ON (top) button three times, then immediately press the OFF (bottom) button three times. The LED will flash ON/OFF five times when completed successfully
